content.eamr: ( ing-5 "2 avocados - peeled, pitted and sliced" )

content.text: 1 (8 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 10 slices
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 (8 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 10 slices" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
		:_result ( preheated-oven )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Warm oil in skillet and add chicken and onion.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Warm"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "skillet"@15:22 / TOOL )
		:_result ( heated-oil )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "add"@27:30 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "chicken"@31:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@43:48 / FOOD )
		:gol ( heated-oil / FOOD )
		:_result ( chicken-in-oil )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cook 15 minutes or until chicken is browned and just about done.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "15 minutes"@8:18 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until chicken is browned and just about done"@22:66 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( chicken-in-oil / FOOD )
		:_result ( covered-chicken )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add salt and pepper to taste.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "pepper"@16:22 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-3-0 "to taste"@23:31 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:gol ( covered-chicken / FOOD )
		:_result ( chicken-with-spice )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Place chicken on cookie sheet and top each breast with 1 to 2 slices of tomato and 2 to 3 slices of cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "cookie sheet"@20:32 / TOOL )
		:_result ( chicken-on-sheet )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "top"@37:40 / AC
		:gol ( "each breast"@41:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "1 to 2 slices of tomato"@58:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "2 to 3 slices of cheese"@86:109 / FOOD )
		:_result ( topped-chicken )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Place in oven for 10 to 15 minutes, until cheese melts.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "oven"@12:16 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "10 to 15 minutes"@21:37 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until cheese melts"@39:57 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( topped-chicken / FOOD )
		:_result ( chicken-in-oven )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Remove from oven, add 2 to 3 slices of avocado on top of each breast, and serve immediately.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:source ( tool-6-0 "oven"@15:19 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( chicken-in-oven / FOOD )
		:_result ( chicken-out-oven )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "add"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "2 to 3 slices of avocado"@25:49 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "top of each breast"@53:71 / FOOD )
		:_result ( avocado-on-chicken )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-2 "serve"@77:82 / AC
		:ppt ( avocado-on-chicken / FOOD )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
